wikipedia_page.main: Mike Wiggs (25 April 1938 – 8 December 2011) was a British middle-distance runner. He competed in the men's 1500 metres at the 1960 Summer Olympics and in the men's 5,000 metres at the 1964 Summer Olympics.

link_mentions.page: Athletics at the 1960 Summer Olympics – Men's 1500 metres

response: He was a member of Blackheath Harriers. In 1964 he was ranked fourth in the UK behind Mike Wiggs, Fergus Murray and Bruce Tulloh.

link_mentions.page: List of British champions in 1500 metres
